div.pre: 455 Pergi, near Serres, Macedonia, 1955 Burial: c. 250-230 B.C. (T) Contents: 386 AR. Alexander III: 60 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 9, Pella 40, Sar- des 2, Miletus 1, Aradus 2, Babylon 4, unc. 2) 186 lifetime and early post. dr. (Asia Minor mints) Philip III: 1 post. tetradr. (Aradus) 2 lifetime dr. (Colophon, Sardes) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. (Euboea?) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 12 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Lysimacheia 1, Lampsacus 3, Magnesia 2, Smyrna 1, Cardia ? 1, unc. 4) 4 lifetime dr. Athens: 114 tetradr. (4th-3rd cent.) Seleucus I: 4 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. (unc. mint) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1957, p. 497, illus. Seyrig's list of varieties on file in ANS
